  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.evaluation.AccuracyEvaluator<T>

    T - the type of data samples
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Evaluator<T>

    public class AccuracyEvaluator<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Evaluator<T>
    Simple evaluation class for computing the accuracy on a testing set.
